name: Meteor Tensei (女ﾃｵ転生)
description:
Meteor Tensei (女ﾃｵ転生) is my attempt at making a Megami Tensei like dungeon crawling game. However I ran out of time so I'll have to leave it in this state.

In the game there isn't much to do, just wander around the first level and talk to some of the NPC's.

Most graphics assets are from open sources, others are made by myself based on art from Kaneko (art director for many SMT games).

Controls are W, A, D for moving around and Enter to accept.
